attributes.action: Introduce legislation giving the public a referendum on the reintroduction of capital punishment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the spiralliing reduction in respect for human life and the growing repugnant methods of killing in the United Kingdom, it is essential we urgently review our reaction to this growing problem. Therefore the government must give the public a voice on the reintroduction of capital punishment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
